title: Why did the Qdoba restaurant that was located in Mayfair Town Center close almost 3 years ago and are there plans to open a new one?  It was always so busy and popular I\'m surprised it closed.
text:
Qdoba was one of the original Mayfaire restaurants and had opened by
the development's one-year anniversary in 2005. It was closed by
2008, but stories then didn't say why. It was one of several
restaurants to close that year.



Unfortunately we can't answer speculative questions about retail
development at MyReporter.com. If such a development is announced, it
will be reported in the StarNews and at StarNewsOnline.com.
